title: VIMPUNEC 2024 Womens Summer Wedding Guest Formal Dresses Cocktail Halter Swing Dress Cute A Line Mini Homecoming Dress
description: Wear this a-line short flowy dress with a sleeveless design that gives a sweet and cute vibe, very suitable for summer.
Enjoy this dressy elegant dress that features mock neck, tie back halter, loose fit and solid color. It is also a great gift to your girlfriend, female friend or relative.
The fashion halter neck dress is made of chiffon fabric, with a layer of 3D flower appliques tulle on the outside, giving a more three-dimensional and textured feel.
Rock this trendy sweet dress that is suitable for wedding, homecoming, prom, beach vacation, birthday party, tea party, bridesmaid dress or cocktail party in spring/summer/fall.

We're committed to providing quality, comfort, and fit. Please consult the size chart before placing your order to ensure the best fit. Model is wearing size S and is 5'6'' tall, BWH: 32'', 24'', 30''. S=2-4, M=6-8, L=10-12, XL=14, XXL=16.
